trans-unit.source: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en datakildekontroll webkontroller for server og andre kontroller kan bruke til å binde til hierarkisk området kartdata.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The SiteMapDataSource control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [angir noden starter](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [henting av området kartdata](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## innføring i SiteMapDataSource kontrollen er en datakilde for området kartdata som lagres av området kartet leverandører som er konfigurert for området.

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapDataSource enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data.
trans-unit.target: SiteMapDataSource aktiverer kontroller for Web-server som ikke er spesielt området Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontrolltypene som skal bindes til hierarkisk området kartdata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke disse webkontroller for serveren til å vise et kart som en tabell med innhold eller til å navigere aktivt et område.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the SiteMapDataSource control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollen som er laget spesielt som et område for Sidenavigering og må derfor ikke en forekomst av kontrollen SiteMapDataSource.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying the Starting Node The SiteMapDataSource binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: ## Angivelse av starter Node for SiteMapDataSource binding til området kartdata som viser visningen er basert på en angitt Start node på kartet et område.

trans-unit.source: By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er det rotnoden i hierarkiet, men det kan også være en node i hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The starting node is identified by the values of several SiteMapDataSource properties as follows: |Starting Node|Property Values| |-------------------|---------------------| |The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Start noden er identifisert av verdiene i flere SiteMapDataSource egenskaper som følger: | Start noden | Egenskapsverdier | |-------------------|---------------------| | Rotnoden for hierarkiet (standardinnstillingen). | The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is not set.| |The node that represents the currently viewed page.|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>Er ikke angitt. | | Noden som representerer gjeldende viste siden. | The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is not set.| |A specific node of the hierarchy.|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>Er ikke angitt. | | En bestemt node i hierarkiet. | The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is set.| If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the SiteMapDataSource control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>Er angitt. | Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>egenskapen er satt til en annen verdi enn 0, den påvirker noden Start og med den tilordne området data hierarki som vises av kontrollen SiteMapDataSource.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The negative or positive integer value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control.
trans-unit.target: Negativ eller positive heltallsverdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>identifiserer antallet nivåer opp eller ned området kartet hierarkiet fra Start noden som er identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>egenskapene til å forskyve noden Start av undertreet som brukes av datakilden kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>egenskapen settes til et negativt tall *- n*, noden Start av undertreet som brukes av datakildekontrollen er overordnet node *n* hierarkisk nivåene over den identifiserte Start noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien *n* er større enn antallet nivåer som overordnet i hierarkisk treet noden Start av undertreet rotnoden for områdets kartet hierarki.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>egenskapen settes til et positivt tall +*n*, Start noden for undertreet som vises, er en underordnet node *n* nivåer under den identifiserte Start noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the SiteMapDataSource attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Fordi én eller flere gren av underordnede noder kan finnes i hierarkiet, prøve SiteMapDataSource å løse en underordnet node direkte på banen mellom den identifiserte Start noden og noden som representerer den forespurte siden hvis mulig.

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden som representerer den forespurte siden ikke er i undertreet identifiserte Start noden, verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden som representerer den forespurte siden er mindre enn *n* nivåer under identifiserte Start noden for forespurte siden noden brukes som Start noden.

trans-unit.source: ## Retrieving Site Map Data Site map data is retrieved from an object, such as , which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: ## Henting av området Data kartområde kartdata hentes fra en -objektet, for eksempel , som er standardleverandøren for kartet for ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the SiteMapDataSource and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi leverandør som er konfigurert for området til å angi området kartdata SiteMapDataSource og kan hente listen over tilgjengelige leverandører ved å åpne den <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Like all data source controls, every instance of a SiteMapDataSource is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view.
trans-unit.target: Alle forekomster av en SiteMapDataSource er knyttet til et enkelt helper-objekt, kjent som en datakildevisning som alle datakildekontroller.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>er en visning i området-kartdata i henhold til egenskapene for datakilden, og som hentes ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> maintains the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> object that the controls bind to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>opprettholder det <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>objektet kontrollene bindes til.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node.
trans-unit.target: Start noden er rotnoden i hierarkiet som standard, men du kan angi noden Start til en node.

trans-unit.source: The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position.
trans-unit.target: Startpunktet kan være en node som er knyttet til gjeldende posisjon på områdekartet eller en absolutt posisjon.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the starting node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi noden Start ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapDataSource is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions.
trans-unit.target: SiteMapDataSource er spesielle for navigasjon data, og støtter ikke vanlige datakilde operasjoner som sortering, filtrering, bla, hurtigbufring eller data registrere operasjoner, for eksempel oppdateringer, innsettinger eller slettinger.

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen datakilden inneholder en samling av dataobjekter kilde visningen.

trans-unit.source: The ContainsListCollection property calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContainsListCollection kaller statisk <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A>metode for <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis datakilden kontrollen inneholder en samling av datakilden visningen dataobjekter; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a single view on the site map data for the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object according to the starting node and other properties of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter en enkelt visning på området kartdataene for den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objektet i henhold til noden Start- og andre egenskaper for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the starting node, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>.
trans-unit.target: URL-adresse for den første noden som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> helper object on the site map data, starting with the node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> or its child, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> helper objekt på kartdataene område, med noden som er identifisert av den <> </> *> eller underordnet hvis den <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> is configured or available for the site.
trans-unit.target: Ikke <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> er konfigurert eller tilgjengelig for området.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> is set.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> but the <>*> is set.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> is set but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> cannot resolve a node for the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>er angitt, men den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> kan ikke løse en node for den angitte URL-adressen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over kontroller for datakilden som kan brukes som kilde for lister med data.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetList method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk GetList-metoden til å hente et sett med objekter som kan brukes som kilde for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> objects.
trans-unit.target: Området kartet kilde kontroller omfatter deres lister med data som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when associated with one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> objects, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control represents a list source object and the GetList method returns a list containing one element — the data source control itself.
trans-unit.target: Derfor når knyttet til én eller flere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>objekter, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>kontrollen representerer kildeobjekt liste, og metoden GetList returnerer en liste som inneholder ett element – datakilde selve kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The GetList method calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetList kaller statiske <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente en liste over objekter som kan brukes som datakilder.</xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> checks whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a valid collection of view names.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>kontrollerer om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>metoden returnerer en gyldig samling av visningsnavn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: If it does, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> returns a list containing one element — the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjør det <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>returnerer en liste som inneholder ett element – <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IList>for kilden kontroller som kan brukes som kilde for lister med data.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a named view on the site map data of the site map provider according to the starting node and other properties of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter en navngitt visning på området kartdata av området kartet leverandøren i henhold til noden Start- og andre egenskaper for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The `viewName` parameter is the URL for the root node of the view, not the name of the data source view as it is with other data source controls that support named views.
trans-unit.target: Den `viewName` parameteren er URL-adressen for rotnode av visningen, ikke navnet på datakildevisningen som for andre data kilde kontrollene som støtter navngitte visninger.

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakilden visning du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> helper object on the site map data, according to the starting node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> property or its child, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> helper objekt i området-kartdata i henhold til Start noden som er identifisert av den <> </> *> egenskap eller underordnet hvis den <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> is set.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> but the <>*> is set.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> is set but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> cannot resolve a node for the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>er angitt, men den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> kan ikke løse en node for den angitte URL-adressen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of named views for the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av navngitte visninger for dataene kildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method returns a collection with one element (the default name) instead of `null` so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A> method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetViewNames returnerer en samling med ett element (standardnavnet) i stedet for `null` slik at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>metoden returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of named <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>av navngitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> supports only one named view, the GetViewNames method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> with one <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> element.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> støtter bare én navngitt visning metoden GetViewNames returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>med én <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> element.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objekt som er knyttet til datakilde-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Provider property to specify the site map provider instance to use with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen for å angi området kartet leverandøren-forekomst for bruk med datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The instance can be different than the provider that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A> property, if set.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten kan være forskjellig fra leverandøren som er identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A>-egenskapen, hvis angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that is associated with the data source control; otherwise, if no provider is explicitly set, the default site map provider.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> som er knyttet til datakildekontrollen; Ellers hvis ingen leverandør er eksplisitt definert, standard-område er tilordnet leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the starting node is retrieved and displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om noden Start hentes og vises.

trans-unit.source: The ShowStartingNode property is evaluated during calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> methods, when the node tree that is returned by these methods is populated.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ShowStartingNode evalueres under kall til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>metoder, når treet noden som er returnert av disse metodene er utfylt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ShowStartingNode property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for ShowStartingNode er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the starting node is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis noden Start vises. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the site map provider that the data source binds to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på området kartet leverandøren som er bundet til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The value of the SiteMapProvider property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for SiteMapProvider er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The name of the site map provider that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> binds to.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på området kartet leverandøren som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> bindes til.

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is <xref:System.String.Empty>, and the default site map provider for the site is used.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard <xref:System.String.Empty>, og brukes standardleverandøren for kartet for området.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the site map node tree is retrieved using the node that represents the current page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om området kartet noden treet er hentet ved hjelp av noden som representerer gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: The StartFromCurrentNode property is evaluated during calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StartFromCurrentNode evalueres under kall til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>metoder for å finne ut hvilken node for kartet skal brukes som en Start peke til bygge treet noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StartFromCurrentNode and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties are mutually exclusive — if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property, ensure that the StartFromCurrentNode property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: StartFromCurrentNode og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>Egenskaper utelukker hverandre — hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>egenskapen sørge for at egenskapen StartFromCurrentNode `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the StartFromCurrentNode property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for StartFromCurrentNode er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis treet noden er hentet i forhold til den gjeldende siden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et positivet eller negativt heltall forskyvning fra Start noden som bestemmer roten hierarkiet som vises av datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the StartingNodeOffset property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen StartingNodeOffset er satt til en annen verdi enn 0, den påvirker noden Start og med den tilordne området data hierarki som vises av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The negative or positive integer value of the StartingNodeOffset identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control.
trans-unit.target: Negativ eller positive heltallsverdien for StartingNodeOffset identifiserer antallet nivåer opp eller ned området kartet hierarkiet fra Start noden som er identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>egenskapene til å forskyve noden Start av undertreet som brukes av datakilden kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the StartingNodeOffset is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den identifiserte Start noden noden som representerer den forespurte siden, ignoreres i StartingNodeOffset.

trans-unit.source: If the StartingNodeOffset property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen StartingNodeOffset er satt til et negativt tall -*n*, noden Start av undertreet som brukes av datakildekontrollen er overordnet node *n* hierarkisk nivåene over den identifiserte Start noden.

trans-unit.source: If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien *n* er større enn antallet nivåer som overordnet i hierarkisk treet noden Start av undertreet rotnoden for områdets kartet hierarki.

trans-unit.source: If the StartingNodeOffset property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen StartingNodeOffset er satt til et positivt tall +*n*, Start noden for undertreet som vises, er en underordnet node *n* nivåer under den identifiserte Start noden.

trans-unit.source: Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Fordi én eller flere gren av underordnede noder kan finnes i hierarkiet, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>prøve å løse en underordnet node direkte på banen mellom den identifiserte Start noden og noden som representerer den forespurte siden hvis mulig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the StartingNodeOffset property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden som representerer den forespurte siden ikke er i undertreet av den identifiserte Start noden, ignoreres verdien for egenskapen StartingNodeOffset.

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden som representerer den forespurte siden er mindre enn *n* nivåer under identifiserte Start noden for forespurte siden noden brukes som Start noden.

trans-unit.source: The value of the StartingNodeOffset property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for StartingNodeOffset er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> is the same as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0, som indikerer at roten hierarkiet vises av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> er identisk med Start noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a node in the site map that the data source then uses as a reference point to retrieve nodes from a hierarchical site map.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en node i områdekartet at datakilden deretter bruker et punkt referanse til å hente noder fra en hierarkisk kart.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>egenskapen binding til området kartdata og viser visningen er basert på en angitt Start node på kartet et område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the StartingNodeUrl property or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Start noden er rotnoden i hierarkiet som standard, men du kan angi noden Start til en node med egenskapen StartingNodeUrl eller angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the StartingNodeUrl property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for StartingNodeUrl er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The URL of a node in the site map.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til en node i områdekartet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> retrieves the identified <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> and any child nodes from the site map.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> henter den identifiserte <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> og alle underordnede noder fra områdekartet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is a collection of <xref:System.Collections.IList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen er en samling av <xref:System.Collections.IList>objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> is associated with one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"></xref> objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> er knyttet til én eller flere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"> </xref> objekter; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IList>for kilden kontroller som kan brukes som kilde for lister med data.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the root node of the view.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til rotnoden for visningen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> helper object on the site map data, according to the starting node identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl*> property or its child, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> helper objekt i området-kartdata i henhold til noden Start identifisert av den <> </> *> egenskap eller underordnet hvis den <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> is configured or available for the site.
trans-unit.target: Ikke <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> er konfigurert eller tilgjengelig for området.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetViewNames*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetViewNames*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetViewNames*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of named <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>av navngitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"></xref> supports only one named view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames*> returns a collection containing one element set to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource"> </xref> støtter bare én navngitt visning av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames*>returnerer en samling som inneholder ett element som er satt til <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames*>
